titleStmt.title: An answer to certain scandalous papers scattered abroad under colour of a Catholick admonition
titleStmt.author: Salisbury, Robert Cecil, Earl of, 1563-1612.
A. B. C. To the Earl of Salisbury.

notesStmt.note: Latin ed. has caption title: Responsis ad libellum quendam famosum Catholicae admonitionis paretextu in vulgus sparsum.
Includes text of a letter addressed "To the Earle of Salisbury," and signed: A.B.C. &c.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
